title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Globally: Priority Pass's Journey with AWS Amplify (DVT319)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全球扩展：Priority Pass 使用 AWS Amplify 的实践之旅 (DVT319)
abstract: In this session, attendees will learn how Priority Pass adopted AWS Amplify to deliver a faster, more reliable, and globally distributed web experience. As part of their wider technology transformation, the Priority Pass engineering team set out to modernize their web platform by retiring legacy systems in favor of a scalable, serverless, and globally performant solution. The talk will cover the evaluation process between Amplify and alternative hosting platforms, key architectural decisions, and technical challenges encountered, including how the team collaborated with AWS engineers to overcome platform constraints. Attendees will gain practical insights for planning enterprise-scale migrations to AWS Amplify.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，与会者将了解 Priority Pass 如何采用 AWS Amplify 来提供更快速、更可靠且全球分布的 Web 体验。作为其更广泛技术转型的一部分，Priority Pass 工程团队着手通过淘汰传统系统来实现 Web 平台现代化，转而采用可扩展、无服务器且全球高性能的解决方案。本次演讲将涵盖 Amplify 与其他托管平台之间的评估过程、关键架构决策以及遇到的技术挑战，包括团队如何与 AWS 工程师合作克服平台限制。与会者将获得规划企业级迁移到 AWS Amplify 的实用见解。
